message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS

Reasoning: The paper discusses research on discourse relations and the use of textual signals to indicate genres, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The adaptation of the signal identification and anchoring scheme also involves machine learning techniques, which could fall under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The examination of the distribution of signaling devices across genres could also involve information retrieval (cs.IR) and data science (cs.DS) techniques.
